body.name: Siluvia Body Pillow for Adults-Premium Adjustable Loft Quilted Body Pillows - Hypoallergenic Fluffy Pillow - Quality Plush Pillow - Down Alternative Pillow(White-LightGray, 21”x54“)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 3 hrs 23 mins
features: SIZE The price including one piece of 21x54 body pillow.

SKIN-FRIENDLY AND COMFOTABLE Siluvia body pillow made with upgraded breathable polyester fabric. The fabric with OEKO-TEX Certificated provides a guarantee of quality. The the quilted surface embroider with delicate S logo, the unique design makes the pillow more fancy, decorative and elegant. Inside with ultra-soft high standard polyester filling, feel soft but still supportive, without odors, safe, and noiseless.

MULTIPLE FUNCTIONS Siluvia comfortable body pillow supports multiple position for different people’s needs, adults, pregnancy, and maternity. Especially for people who insecure, need abdominal, back, hips or knees support. Also good for relaxing, reading, nursing. The pillow provides your body fully support and adequate comfort while you sleeping or rest. It also can be a simple bedside for your bed.
PACKAING One body pillow vacuum sealed in plastic bag and fitted in a nice carton with Siluvia logo. Once open the package, please leave 24 hours for the pillow to fully fluff up.
EASY TO CARE Machine wash in cold water and tumble dry on low, or bask in sunlight.
body.description: Easy to care Machine wash in cold water and tumble dry on low, or bask in sunlight. Recommend with two laundry ball to help inserts fluffy up.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Have a nice sleep with Siluvia Siluvia body pillows provide multi functions, applicable to a variety of scenarios. Not limited to use on bed, it can also be used on sofa, the body pillow's mean function is to relax your body, to relief your body's pressure.

Body Fitted Size 21x54 Inch body pillow, fit your body nicely and provide more functions. Letter embroidery The the quilted surface embroider with delicate S logo, the unique design makes the pillow more fancy, decorative and elegant. Designed Zip The Siluvia long pillow designed a zip on side, which can help adjust the filling easily, you may add or remove the filling to help the pillow fit your body more comfortable. Soft & Breathable Fabric Siluvia body pillow made with upgraded breathable polyester fabric. The fabric with OEKO-TEX Certificated provide our customer good quality.

Muti-position as you like Nice body support, may help relief the pain from back, neck, legs or spine.Multi functions for reading, relaxing, working or nursing on bed or sofa.Good choice for pregnancy care, help relief the pressure from mother's belly, back, legs or waist.Can be a simple bedside for your bed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great body support
reviews.reviewText: I`ve always been a side sleeper for the longest time no matter what, this pillow replaces my 6th body pillow and it is my best of all.I love that it is longer and wider than the body pillows I have owned.I need my body pillow to maintain proper body posture.This pillow feels amazing, very comfortable, it maintains its shape and right firmness.The pillow was delivered quietly, packing was amazing.It came vacuum sealed, I left it the whole day to fully expand.I highly recommend this body pillow

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's a big body pillow and nice!
reviews.reviewText: Very nice quality pillow. Once you open it, give it some time to expand. It gets pretty big and is soft and comfortable. My only (slight) complaint is that it is pretty heavy. If you roll around with your pillow it can be a little difficult (I am a small person), but overall I really like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I have purchased several body pillows over the years and this one is tops! This pillow holds it shape, is just the right firmness and the quality is superb for the cost.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality pillow
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is pretty good. It was a bit thicker than it looked, so it did take some time to get used to it. The overall pillow quality, both the fabric and the filling, seems pretty good. It is soft but not too soft. The fabric is not as breathable as I wish though, so the pillow can get quite hot. I'm not sure why they added the blue name tag at one of the corners of the pillow though, it is very uncomfortable to deal with. Overall though, I'd say I'm pretty satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great body pillow
reviews.reviewText: This pillow is well-made and heavy. I bought one at target that literally was falling apart inside the material. It was such a mess to try to sleep with because the inside kept bunching up. This pillow is very solid . Perfect for me, I’m glad I ordered it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Siluvia Body Pillow for Adults and it's been a complete game-changer for my sleep routine! The adjustable loft feature allows me to customize the firmness to my liking, ensuring I get the perfect support every night. The quilted design not only adds a touch of luxury but also enhances the overall comfort. I was particularly impressed with the hypoallergenic and fluffy aspects of the pillow, making it a great choice for anyone with allergies or sensitive skin. The plush quality feels premium, much like a down alternative, and the dual-tone White-LightGray color is elegantly versatile. Measuring 21”x54”, it's the perfect size for full-body support. Highly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these body pillows
reviews.reviewText: These body pillows are not like the ones you’ll get at Walmart or similar stores. These are full of filling and hold their shape very well. They are fluffy and comfortable. They’re also kinda heavy but I like that. My husband has a habit of malformed his pillows as he sleeps on them but this one has held its shape so far. Very happy with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this body pillow initially so I can use it to keep my spine and back straight since im a side sleeper. I usually use a pillow to hold a pillow in between my knees/legs so I thought a body pillow would be a good way to keep my back from hurting. This pillow, however, is comfy and nice but if you’re using it for the reason it’s too fluffy and firm

Honestly looking forward to try this pillow, with high star rating review, when it’s arrived, the box are quite small, well its vacuumed.. ok! When we open it its not much different, its not fluffed much! Im so surprised we have to try to fluff it, which we not supposed to (???) after all, the pillow are very low its not suitable for the main pillow it will be sufficient and comfortable if you buy 2 of them and lay it on top of each other..quite disappointed..
